channel.title: Pages on Altran ISY Data Analytics
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Altran ISY Data Analytics

item.title: About
item.description: About us The Data Analytics team is part of the Altran Belux Intelligent Systems (ISY) division, and provides engineering services to several customers in Belgium. Our academic background is in engineering and/or physical sciences, and our job is all about making sense out of data. We’re spread between Brussels and Ghent (and sometimes Leuven). Altran Altran Technologies is an innovation an engineering consulting firm. We operate in high technology in a variety of domains, from life sciences to mechanical engineering, from the energy to the transporation sector.
